original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ rūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho narūpāvacaro
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁rūpāvacar aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁na rūp ā vacar o

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… ārammaṇe
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁na rūpāvacara ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh o ▁nan arūp ā vacar o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi
